author: Zachary D. Rymer
title: Will Barry Bonds' Single-Season or Career Home Run Record Ever Be Broken?
description: Barry Bonds' single-season record of 73 home runs has stood for 19 years. His career record of 762 home runs, for 13.    And counting. Possibly for a very long time...
content:
Eric Risberg/Associated Press
Barry Bonds' single-season record of 73 home runs has stood for 19 years. His career record of 762 home runs, for 13.
And counting. Possibly for a very long time.
As we continue with Steroid Week here at B/R, we're frankly not… [+6625 chars]
